sentences.en: Her son Peter adapted effortlessly to his new surroundings.
sentences.cn: 她儿子彼得很快就适应了新环境。

sentences.en: Her thoughts were staid and solemnly adapted to a condition.
sentences.cn: 她的思想已经定形,安于一板一眼地顺应现实.

sentences.en: I adapted quickly to the new climate.
sentences.cn: 我很快地适应了这种新的气候.

sentences.en: Many of Dickens'books have been adapted as films.
sentences.cn: 狄更斯的许多书都已改编成电影.

sentences.en: Patrick needs to use specially adapted computer equipment.
sentences.cn: 帕特里克需要使用专门改装过的计算机设备。

sentences.en: Schumacher adapted effortlessly to his new surroundings.
sentences.cn: 舒马赫非常轻松地适应了新环境。

sentences.en: The camel's feet, well adapted for dry sand, are useless on mud.
sentences.cn: 骆驼的蹄子虽然非常适合于在干沙上行走，碰到泥泞时却无计可施。

sentences.en: The facilities have been adapted to give access to wheelchair users.
sentences.cn: 这些设施已经改造过以方便轮椅使用者进入。

sentences.en: The movie was adapted from a novel.
sentences.cn: 这部电影是由小说改编的.

sentences.en: The pieces he is reading are adapted from the writings of Michael Frayn.
sentences.cn: 他目前阅读的作品改编自迈克尔·弗雷恩的著作。

sentences.en: The professor adapted his lecture to his audience.
sentences.cn: 教授使他讲的课适合于听众.

sentences.en: These styles can be adapted to suit individual tastes.
sentences.cn: 这些式样可以加以更改,以适合个人的喜好.

sentences.en: This book is adapted for beginners.
sentences.cn: 本书经过改写以适合初学者.

sentences.en: This play is adapted from a novel written by Dack.
sentences.cn: 这个剧本是根据达克写的一部小说改编的.

sentences.en: This play is adapted from a novel.
sentences.cn: 这个剧本是根据一本小说改写的.

trans.tran_en: If something is adapted to a particular situation or purpose, it is especially suitable for it

trans.tran_cn: （使）适应， （使）适合( adapt的过去式和过去分词 )，改编，改写，改变…以适合(for)，适应于，适应不同情况（或环境）(to)
